docs.lead_paragraph: The author’s 9-year-old son suffered more than 100 seizures a day. When he started a high-fat, very low-carb diet, the number dropped by three-quarters.
docs.snippet: The author’s 9-year-old son suffered more than 100 seizures a day. When he started a high-fat, very low-carb diet, the number dropped by three-quarters.

docs.lead_paragraph: Patients with chronic kidney disease who took Vytorin, a cholesterol-lowering pill, had one-sixth fewer heart attacks, strokes or operations to unblock their arteries than patients taking a placebo, according to the results of a new study presented on Saturday.

headline.main: Study Suggests a Cholesterol Pill Benefits Kidney Patients

docs.abstract: A new study reports heart benefits for patient with chronic kidney disease who took Vytorin to lower their cholesterol.
docs.snippet: A new study reports heart benefits for patient with chronic kidney disease who took Vytorin to lower their cholesterol.

docs.lead_paragraph: The painkilling drug propoxyphene, sold under the Darvon and Darvocet brands and used by about 10 million Americans last year, will be removed from the market because of serious heart risks, the Food and Drug Administration said on Friday. The announcement ended a 32-year dispute over the safety of the 53-year-old drug. The F.D.A. recommended doctors switch patients to other painkillers, notably Extra Strength Tylenol or acetaminophen.

headline.main: Painkiller To Be Pulled Off Market

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration says painkiller drug propoxyphene will be removed from market because of serious heart risks; drug is sold under Darvon and Darvocet brands and was used by 10 million Americans in 2009; photo (M)

headline.main: Darvon Pulled From Market by F.D.A.

docs.abstract: The pain killer and related drugs can cause fatal heart rhythms.

docs.lead_paragraph: Patients taking the drug anacetrapib had a 39.8 percent reduction in bad cholesterol and a 138.1 percent increase in good cholesterol.

headline.seo: Merck Drug to Raise Good Cholesterol and Lower Bad Shows Promise
headline.main: Merck Drug for Cutting Cholesterol Is Promising
headline.print_headline: Merck Drug For Cutting Cholesterol Is Promising

docs.lead_paragraph: A large study shows that nesiritide, which a smaller study had suggested had great promise, does not seem to be particularly effective.

headline.seo: Heart Failure Study Debunks Findings on Nesiritide
headline.main: Good News and Bad From a Heart Study
headline.print_headline: Good News and Bad From a Heart Study
